attributes.action: Stop MP’s free meals in parliament and stop them claiming for meals on expenses.
attributes.background: This is to stop MP’s from having meals in parliament and claiming for meals on expenses which is fully subsidised by us the public

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

MPs' expenses aren't the responsibility of the UK Government and Parliament. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/

You might wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/208776
